title: The After Show Discusses Feedback on Flavored Cigars
itunes:title: The After Show Discusses Feedback on Flavored Cigars
description:
This week, The After Show reads listener email about the flavored cigar episode. Did everyone hate the flavored cigars in the care package?

The Cigar Authority is a member of the United Podcast Network and is recorded live in front of a studio audience at Studio 21 Podcast Cafe upstairs at Two Guys Smoke Shop in Salem, NH and as always you can find many of the cigars we discuss at http://www.2GuysCigars.com/.
